definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: a devastation, waste;—abs. ´[[שׁ]]: Ex 23:29 +; pl. cstr. [[שִׁמְמוֹת]] Je 51:26 +;—waste, usu. of land, city, house, etc., Ex 23:29 (E), Is 1:7 (prob. del., with words foll. Stu:JP Th. 1877, 714 FB:JBL (1890), 84), Le 26:33 (H), Je 4:27 + 14 t. Je (‖[[מֵאֵין ]] ´[[אָדָם ונו]]: Je 32:43, [[מֵאֵין ישֵׁב]] Je 34:22), Ez Eze 6:14 + 18 t. Ez (Eze 35:7 a read [[שְׁמָמָה וּמְשַׁמָּה]] for MT [[שִֽׁמְמָה וּשְׁמָמָה]], so Hi Co Toy Krae al.) +; of prince, ´[[יִלְבַּשׁ שׁ]]: Ez Eze 7:27; of idols Mic 1:7; ´[[כּוֹם שַׁמָּה ושׁ]]: Ez Eze 23:33.—Ez Eze 35:12 v. [[שׁמם]]
